pullrequest.title: parse model.config such that it allows <model><urdf>file.urdf</urdf></model>.

content.raw:
well... xacro is not part of urdf, so we are not offering support for it by adding `<urdf>` tags here (just like irb script is not part of sdf)? maybe we can start steering ros urdf users to use irb?

but `package://` implies resolving path by means of [ros resource retriever](http://wiki.ros.org/resource_retriever), currently we don't plan on resolving ros package paths.  Current urdf parser in sdf replaces `package://` by `model://`, which requires packages to be a gazebo model resources as well (i.e. has both `package.xml` and `model.config`...
content.html:
well... xacro is not part of urdf, so we are not offering support for it by adding <urdf> tags here (just like irb script is not part of sdf)? maybe we can start steering ros urdf users to use irb?

but package:// implies resolving path by means of ros resource retriever, currently we don't plan on resolving ros package paths. Current urdf parser in sdf replaces package:// by model://, which requires packages to be a gazebo model resources as well (i.e. has both package.xml and model.config...
